value.title: Starcraft 2 Newbie Guide - 001 - Tutorial
value.excerpt: A newbie guide for Starcraft 2 multiplayer! value.title: Starcraft 2 Newbie Guide - 008 - Applying Pressure
value.excerpt: Constantly scout your opponent, and don't be afraid to apply pressure.  By keeping your opponent pinned, you create opportunities to get further ahead.
